--- format: html: code-fold: show code-summary: "Ocultar código" code-line-numbers: false code-annotations: false code-link: true code-tools: source: true toggle: true caption: "Código" code-overflow: scroll page-layout: full editor_options: chunk_output_type: console categories: - geom_image - geom_rect - geom_point execute: eval: false echo: true warning: false title: "Semana 48" date: last-modified author: Víctor Gauto --- Duración de la quema del *Böögg* en el festival [Sechseläuten](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sechsel%C3%A4uten). ::: {.column-page-right} ![Semana 48, 2025](semana_48.png) ::: ## Paquetes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(glue) library(ggtext) library(showtext) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: ## Estilos Colores. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} c1 <- "#da3500" c2 <- "#004b73" c3 <- "white" ``` ::: Fuentes: Ubuntu y JetBrains Mono. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} font_add( family = "ubuntu", regular = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Regular.ttf", bold = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Bold.ttf", italic = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Italic.ttf" ) font_add( family = "jet", regular = "././fuente/JetBrainsMonoNLNerdFontMono-Regular.ttf" ) showtext_auto() showtext_opts(dpi = 300) ``` ::: ## Epígrafe ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} fuente <- glue( "Datos: ", "{{tidytuesdayR}} semana 48, ", "Zurich's \"Sechselaeuten\" spring festival." ) autor <- glue("**Víctor Gauto**") icon_twitter <- glue("") icon_instagram <- glue("") icon_github <- glue("") icon_mastodon <- glue("󰫑") icon_bsky <- glue("") usuario <- glue("**vhgauto**") sep <- glue("**|**") mi_caption <- glue( "{fuente}
{autor} {sep} {icon_github} {icon_twitter} {icon_instagram} ", "{icon_mastodon} {icon_bsky} {usuario}" ) ``` ::: ## Datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, 48) sechselaeuten <- tuesdata$sechselaeuten ``` ::: ## Procesamiento Me interesa la duración anual sobre una fotografía del incendio del [*Böögg*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sechsel%C3%A4uten). Selecciono los años y las duraciones. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d <- sechselaeuten |> select(año = year, dur = duration) |> drop_na() |> filter(año > 1950) ``` ::: ## Figura Creo u tibble para incorporar la figura de fondo del panel y un rectángulo superpuesto para darle transparencia. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} img_tbl <- tibble( x = I(.5), y = I(.5), image = "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/3c/Sechsel%C3%A4uten_2010_-_B%C3%B6%C3%B6gg_IMG_6468.JPG" ) rect_tbl <- tibble( xmin = I(0), xmax = I(1), ymin = I(0), ymax = I(1) ) ``` ::: Título y figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} mi_titulo <- glue( "Sechselaeuten es un festival anual en Zúrich en el que prenden fuego un muñeco (Böögg). Se registra el tiempo hasta la explosión de su cabeza. Cuenta la leyenda que cuanto **más rápida** es su destrucción **más cálido** es el verano." ) g <- ggplot() + ggimage::geom_image( data = img_tbl, aes(x, y, image = image), size = .76 ) + geom_rect( data = rect_tbl, aes(xmin = xmin, ymin = ymin, xmax = xmax, ymax = ymax), fill = alpha(c3, .7) ) + geom_point( data = d, aes(año, dur), shape = 21, size = 5, fill = c1, color = c2, stroke = 1 ) + scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1950, 2025, 10), limits = c(1950, 2026)) + scale_y_continuous(breaks = scales::breaks_width(10), limits = c(0, 62)) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + labs( x = NULL, y = "Duración (min)", title = mi_titulo, caption = mi_caption ) + theme_classic(base_family = "ubuntu", base_size = 22) + theme(aspect.ratio = 3050 / 2288) + theme_sub_plot( margin = margin_auto(10), background = element_rect(fill = scales::col_lighter(c1, 55), color = NA), title.position = "plot", title = element_textbox_simple( margin = margin(b = 20, r = -10), size = rel(1.2) ), caption = element_markdown( color = c1, size = rel(.7), lineheight = 1.3, margin = margin(t = 20) ) ) + theme_sub_panel( grid = element_line(linewidth = .1), grid.minor = element_blank() ) + theme_sub_axis( text = element_text(family = "jet", color = c2), title = element_text(size = rel(1.2), color = c1), line = element_line(color = c2), ticks = element_line(color = c2) ) ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_48.png", width = 30, height = 42, units = "cm" ) ``` :::
